english.segment1: Your Name is highly exalted. Jesus forever be glorified. forever be glorified
english.segment2: and Your name is power to conquer. Your fame resounds throughout heaven and earth. resounds throughout heaven and earth
english.segment3: Chorus: name above all names, You are glorious. wonderful and true, and powerful are You. there will be a day, when every knee will bow. before Your holiness, every tongue confess. You're the name, the name above all names
english.segment4: rulers will one day be silent. lost in the wonder and awe of Your name. the wonder and awe of Your name
english.segment5: eternal - none is Your equal. we cry no other God but You. no other God but You
english.segment7: Bridge: every knee will bow. every knee must bow. every knee must bow. to You. every knee will bow. every knee must bow. every knee must bow. to You. yes, to You
